message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. 60/40 split seems fair.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I think a 60/40 split in my favor is more appropriate. Let's see if you agree.
That's not much different from my offer, Bob!  I'm willing to negotiate, but this isn't moving in the right direction.
Okay Bob, let's meet in the middle. 55/45. It's a fair deal considering the time pressure and inflation.
